monogr.title: Contested Coexistence: Insights on Arabic Christianity from Theology to Migration. Proceedings from the Summer School “Arabic Christianity: History, Culture, Language, Theology, Liturgy” (Münster, July 18–August 12, 2016)

body.bibl: Gehm, Jan. “Koexistenz in Der Autonomen Region Kurdistan, Nordirak: Christen, Jesiden Und Muslime Zwischen Den Fronten in Irakisch-Kurdistan. Verortungen Und Erfahrungen.” In Contested Coexistence: Insights on Arabic Christianity from Theology to Migration. Proceedings from the Summer School “Arabic Christianity: History, Culture, Language, Theology, Liturgy” (Münster, July 18–August 12, 2016), edited by Octavian Mihoc and Ryann Elizabeth Craig, 201–8. Göttinger Orientforschungen, I. Reihe: Syriaca 59. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2020.
